channel.title: <.::How Do I Change The Exp You Recieve For Range?::.>
channel.description:
Hey...I need help on changing the exp rate that you recieve when you use range, because when my players hit they get soo much exp that they almost recive 60 range and 60 hitpoints allready. I need to know how to change the exp you get for range, and for hitpoints [b]WHEN USING RANGE[/b].
Thanks A Lot, .::King::.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 21, 2008, 10:10:56 AM[/size][hr]Anyone help please?
